Description: Limestone ostracon with 15 lines on one side containing a promissio of two monks.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably on the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (120-125, pl.9)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82874) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82874)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 8 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
